remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`baseType`是`null`，返回所有类型。If `baseType` is `null`, all types are returned. 否则，返回仅从指定的基类型派生的类型。Otherwise, only types derived from the specified base type are returned. 如果`excludeGlobalTypes`是`false`，检查所有被引用程序集中的类型。If `excludeGlobalTypes` is `false`, types from all referenced assemblies are checked. 否则，检查非-全局程序集缓存 (GAC) 引用程序集中的唯一类型。Otherwise, only types from non-Global Assembly Cache (GAC) referenced assemblies are checked. 有关详细信息，请参阅[使用程序集和全局程序集缓存](~/docs/framework/app-domains/working-with-assemblies-and-the-gac.md)。For more information, see [Working with Assemblies and the Global Assembly Cache](~/docs/framework/app-domains/working-with-assemblies-and-the-gac.md).
